bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Methods and Equipment for Measuring the Transmission Characteristics of Analog Voice Frequency Circuits
IEEE Standard Methods and Equipment for Measuring the Transmission Characteristics of Analog Voice Frequency Circuits

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Prescribes criteria that establish protection requirements for Class 1E power systems and equipment. It describes the purpose of and the means for obtaining protection from electrical and mechanical damage, or failures that can occur within a time period that is shorter than that required for operator action. It includes both design and documentation requirements. It does not include physical plant design requirements to protect against certain events. .

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
